LanguageData.Balista_Crate.label: 弩炮组件箱
LanguageData.Balista_Crate.description: Use this to build Balista that fires a the equivalent of a massive crossbow bolt. Must me manned。
LanguageData.Catapult_Crate.label: 投石器组件箱
LanguageData.Catapult_Crate.description: Use this to build catapult that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned。
LanguageData.M240B_Crate.label: 7.62x51mm M240B 机枪组件箱
LanguageData.M240B_Crate.description: Use this to build a 7.62x51mm M240B MG, a type of stationary manned turret。
LanguageData.MinigunTurret_Crate.label: 7.62x51mm M134 速射机枪组件箱
LanguageData.MinigunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a M134 Minigun, a type of stationary manned turret. Requires 7.62x51mm ammo。
LanguageData.MGTurret_Crate.label: 50BMG M2 勃朗宁 机枪组件箱
LanguageData.MGTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 50BMG M2 Browning MG, a type of stationary manned turret。
LanguageData.KPV_Crate.label: 14.5mm KPV 机枪组件箱
LanguageData.KPV_Crate.description: Use this to build a 14.5mm KPV MG, a type of stationary manned turret. Requires 14.5mm bullets for ammo。
LanguageData.Oerlikonautocannon_Crate.label: 20x102mm 奥瑞康机炮组件箱
LanguageData.Oerlikonautocannon_Crate.description: Use this to build an Oerlikon autocannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 20x102mm for ammo。
LanguageData.VulcanCannon_Crate.label: 20mm 火神炮组件箱
LanguageData.VulcanCannon_Crate.description: Use this to build a 20mm Vulcan Cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. Requires 800 W to function and it uses 20mmx20 Vulcan Bullets for ammo。
LanguageData.Chain_Crate.label: 30x165mm GSh-30 火炮组件箱
LanguageData.Chain_Crate.description: Use this to build a 30x165mm GSh-30 cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30x165mm for ammo。
LanguageData.Avenger_Crate.label: 30x173mm GAU-8 复仇者火炮组件箱
LanguageData.Avenger_Crate.description: Use this to build a 30x173mm GAU-8 Avenger, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30x173mm Avenger Shells for ammo。
LanguageData.AGSturret_Crate.label: 30mm AGS-17组件箱
LanguageData.AGSturret_Crate.description: Use this to build a AGS-17, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL turret grenades for ammo。
LanguageData.AGCturret_Crate.label: 30mm AGS-30组件箱
LanguageData.AGCturret_Crate.description: Use this to build AGS-30, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 30mmx6 GL turret grenades for ammo。
LanguageData.Mortar_Crate.label: 81mm 迫击炮组件箱
LanguageData.Mortar_Crate.description: Use this to build an mortar launcher, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 81mm explosive mortar shells for ammo。
LanguageData.FlakTurret_Crate.label: 90mm 高射炮组件箱
LanguageData.FlakTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 90mm flak turret a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 90mm cannon shells for ammo。
LanguageData.CannonTurret_Crate.label: 120mm 坦克炮组件箱
LanguageData.CannonTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 120mm tank cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 120mm cannon shells for ammo。
LanguageData.HowitzerTurret_Crate.label: 155mm 榴弹炮组件箱
LanguageData.HowitzerTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 155m howitzer cannon, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 155mm howitzer shells for ammo。
LanguageData.TOW_Crate.label: AT missile BGM-71 TOW组件箱
LanguageData.TOW_Crate.description: Use this to build a light missile system BGM-71 TOW, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses AT missiles for ammo。
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Crate.label: AT missile FGM-148 标枪导弹组件箱
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Crate.description: Use this to build a light missile system FGM-148 Javelin, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses AT missile for ammo。
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Crate.label: 130mm 中型导弹组件箱
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Crate.description: Use this to build a medium missile system, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 130mmx2 Missiles for ammo。
LanguageData.RocketLauncher_Crate.label: 130mm 重型导弹组件箱
LanguageData.RocketLauncher_Crate.description: Use this to build a heavy missile system, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 130mmx3 missiles for ammo。
LanguageData.SentryTurret_Crate.label: .40 轻型自动机枪组件箱
LanguageData.SentryTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a sentry light turret, a type of stationary automatic turret. It requires power to function。
LanguageData.HeavyTurret_Crate.label: 14.5x114mm 重型自动炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.HeavyTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a sentry heavy turret, a type of unmanned automatic turret. Requires power to function。
LanguageData.NavalGunTurret_Crate.label: 35mm 自动炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.NavalGunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build 35mm 自动哨戒炮塔, a type of stationary unmanned turret. Requires power to function。
LanguageData.SentryRocketLauncher_Crate.label: AT missile 自动火箭发射器组件箱
LanguageData.SentryRocketLauncher_Crate.description: Use this to build a sentry rocket launcher, a type of stationary unmanned turret. Requires power to function。
LanguageData.SentryRocketLauncher_Crate.stuffProps.st: AT missile Sentry rocket launcher组件箱
LanguageData.SentryBlasterTurret_Crate.label: 自动炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.SentryBlasterTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a sentry blaster turret, a type of automatic turrets. Requires power to function。
LanguageData.LaserTurret_Crate.label: 激光炮塔组件箱
LanguageData.LaserTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a laser turret, a type of unmanned automatic turret. It requires power to function。
